abilityEffect: As long as Cacturne ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't attach any Special Energy cards (except for [D] and [M] Energy cards) from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokémon.

effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.
